detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Obliquity.sol#252-258):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Obliquity.sol#256)

Obliquity.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Obliquity.sol#535-539) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,10000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Obliquity.sol#538)

detectors.description:

symbol() should be declared external:

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
